scripts.backend: npm run build --prefix api && node server.js
scripts.clear: cd client && rm -rf build && rm -rf cache
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.dev: npm run clear && concurrently "cd client && npm run build && npm run dev" "cd api && npm rum dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
